name: Sacrifice 2
description:
Once again, help Olaf the square make his way across the levels and finish the game in the shortest time possible, this time with a completely different mechanic.

In this game, in order to win you need to lose. A LOT! In order to finish each level you will have to create replicas of yourself that you can use as platforms. 

NORMAL MODE: After you create a replica 3 times, you die and respawn on the beginning of the level. However, that replica is kept on the exact spot where you died and you can use it as a platform.

HARDCORE MODE: After you create a replica 1 time, you die and respawn on the beginning of the level. However, that replica is kept on the exact spot where you died and you can use it as a platform.

Be careful though! Create a replica or die at the wrong place, and you might block your way to the end of the level. If this happens you will have to reset the current level from scratch.

CONTROLS:

A & D - left and right

SpaceBar - jump

M - "die" on purpose(a replica of yourself stays as a platform on the exact place where you died)

R - Reset current level

DISCLAIMER:
This game was made in 48 hours.
